languages.text: "И путеводной звездой в том плавании мне послужила отнюдь не вера и звон золотых побрякушек, о нет. Я осознала могущество тех, кто скрывается в ослепительном сиянии подобных вам светил, шерин. Тень, что поддерживает свет и порядок в обход закостенелых законов. И я стану ей, этой тенью, шерин. Быть может — даже вашей? Не очередной пешкой {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллика{/g}, а полноправным Теневым Бароном Простора. Силой куда более могущественной и устрашающей, чем скромный торгаш-наместник".

traits.locale_text: "И путеводной звездой в том плавании мне послужила отнюдь не вера и звон золотых побрякушек, о нет. Я осознала могущество тех, кто скрывается в ослепительном сиянии подобных вам светил, шерин. Тень, что поддерживает свет и порядок в обход закостенелых законов. И я стану ей, этой тенью, шерин. Быть может — даже вашей? Не очередной пешкой {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллика{/g}, а полноправным Теневым Бароном Простора. Силой куда более могущественной и устрашающей, чем скромный торгаш-наместник".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "And it was not faith or the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."
languages.original_text: "И путеводной звездой в том плавании мне послужила отнюдь не вера и звон золотых побрякушек, о нет. Я осознала могущество тех, кто скрывается в ослепительном сиянии подобных вам светил, шерин. Тень, что поддерживает свет и порядок в обход закостенелых законов. И я стану ей, этой тенью, шерин. Быть может — даже вашей? Не очередной пешкой {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллика{/g}, а полноправным Теневым Бароном Простора. Силой куда более могущественной и устрашающей, чем скромный торгаш-наместник".

traits.locale_text: "And it was neither faith nor the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I wised up to the power of those who hide in the blinding light of the glorious suns like yourself, shereen. A shadow that upholds the order and the light bypassing the antiquated laws? I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps even yours? Not yet another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and intimidating than a penny-pinching steward."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And it was neither faith nor the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I wised up to the power of those who hide in the blinding light of the glorious suns like yourself, shereen. A shadow that upholds the order and the light bypassing the antiquated laws? A power far more imperious and intimidating than a penny-pinching steward."

I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “在那场航行中，指引我的并不是信仰，也不是金光闪闪的饰品。噢，都不是。我意识到了某种力量，那些拥有力量的人们，藏在你发出的刺眼明光之中，亲爱的。这种力量会化为阴影，绕过那些早已过时的律法，维护秩序与光明。我愿意成为那个阴影，亲爱的。或许，我可以成为你的阴影？我不再是{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}的走卒，而会亲自成为科罗努斯扩区的阴影男爵，成为比那些一文不名的管家更加强大、更加可怕的力量。”
languages.original_text: "And it was not faith or the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."

traits.locale_text: “在那场航行中，指引我的并不是信仰，也不是金光闪闪的饰品。噢，都不是。我意识到了某种力量，那些拥有力量的人们，藏在你发出的刺眼明光之中，亲爱的。这种力量会化为阴影，绕过那些早已过时的律法，维护秩序与光明。我愿意成为那个阴影，亲爱的。或许，我可以成为你的阴影？我不再是{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}的走卒，而会亲自成为科罗努斯扩区的阴影男爵，成为比那些一文不名的管家更加强大、更加可怕的力量。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "And it was not faith or the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the Kasballica Mission, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."

languages.text: «Y no fueron la fe ni el resplandor de la joyería dorada lo que me empujó a ese viaje, oh, no. Comprendí el poder que poseían quienes se ocultaban en la luz cegadora de faros como usted, shereen. El poder de ser una sombra que mantiene el orden y la esperanza sorteando leyes anticuadas. Me convertiré en esa sombra, shereen. Tal vez incluso pueda ser la suya. No seré una esbirra más de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}misión Kasballica{/g}, sino una baronesa sombría de la Extensión por derecho propio. Como un poder mucho más imperioso y temible que el de un simple chupatintas obsesionado con las cuentas».
languages.original_text: "And it was not faith or the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."

traits.locale_text: «Y no fueron la fe ni el resplandor de la joyería dorada lo que me empujó a ese viaje, oh, no. Comprendí el poder que poseían quienes se ocultaban en la luz cegadora de faros como usted, shereen. El poder de ser una sombra que mantiene el orden y la esperanza sorteando leyes anticuadas. Me convertiré en esa sombra, shereen. Tal vez incluso pueda ser la suya. No seré una esbirra más de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}misión Kasballica{/g}, sino una baronesa sombría de la Extensión por derecho propio. Como un poder mucho más imperioso y temible que el de un simple chupatintas obsesionado con las cuentas».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、その航海にあたしを導いたのは、信仰でもなく、金色の宝石の輝きでもなかったわ。あたしはあんたのようなまばゆい光の中に隠れる者の力に気づいたの。時代遅れの法律を回避することで、秩序と光を守る影になる力に。もしかしたら、あたしはあんたの影になれるかもしれないわ、シャリーン。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}の手先ではなく、エクスパンスの影の男爵になるのよ。どんな小銭稼ぎの執事より専制的で、強固な権力よね」
languages.original_text: "And it was not faith or the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、その航海にあたしを導いたのは、信仰でもなく、金色の宝石の輝きでもなかったわ。あたしはあんたのようなまばゆい光の中に隠れる者の力に気づいたの。時代遅れの法律を回避することで、秩序と光を守る影になる力に。もしかしたら、あたしはあんたの影になれるかもしれないわ、シャリーン。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}の手先ではなく、エクスパンスの影の男爵になるのよ。どんな小銭稼ぎの執事より専制的で、強固な権力よね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Und es waren nicht der Glaube oder der Glanz goldenen Tands, die mich auf dieser Reise leiteten, oh nein. Ich habe begriffen, wie viel Macht jene haben, die sich im gleißenden Schein von Lichtgestalten wie Euch verbergen, Shereen. Die Macht eines Schatten, der die Ordnung und das Licht aufrecht erhält, indem er antiquierte Gesetze umgeht. Ich werde zu diesem Schatten werden, Shereen. Vielleicht werde ich sogar zu Eurem Schatten werden? Keine weitere Marionette der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, sondern ein eigenständiger Schattenbaron der Ausdehnung. Eine Macht, die viel gefährlicher und formidabler ist als jeder knausrige Truchsess."
languages.original_text: "And it was not faith or the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."

traits.locale_text: "Und es waren nicht der Glaube oder der Glanz goldenen Tands, die mich auf dieser Reise leiteten, oh nein. Ich habe begriffen, wie viel Macht jene haben, die sich im gleißenden Schein von Lichtgestalten wie Euch verbergen, Shereen. Die Macht eines Schatten, der die Ordnung und das Licht aufrecht erhält, indem er antiquierte Gesetze umgeht. Ich werde zu diesem Schatten werden, Shereen. Vielleicht werde ich sogar zu Eurem Schatten werden? Keine weitere Marionette der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, sondern ein eigenständiger Schattenbaron der Ausdehnung. Eine Macht, die viel gefährlicher und formidabler ist als jeder knausrige Truchsess."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Et ce n'est ni la foi ni le scintillement de babioles dorées qui m'ont guidée jusque là, oh non. J'ai découvert le pouvoir de ceux qui se cachent dans l'éclat aveuglant des lumières telles que vous, shereen. Le pouvoir que détiennent les ombres qui préservent l'ordre et la lumière en contournant des lois archaïques. Je vais devenir l'une de ces ombres, shereen. Peut-être même la vôtre ? Pas un pion parmi tant d'autres au service de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g}, mais une baronne de l'ombre à part entière dans les Étendues. C'est un pouvoir bien plus impérieux et plus formidable que celui d'une simple intendante âpre au gain. »
languages.original_text: "And it was not faith or the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."

traits.locale_text: « Et ce n'est ni la foi ni le scintillement de babioles dorées qui m'ont guidée jusque là, oh non. J'ai découvert le pouvoir de ceux qui se cachent dans l'éclat aveuglant des lumières telles que vous, shereen. Le pouvoir que détiennent les ombres qui préservent l'ordre et la lumière en contournant des lois archaïques. Je vais devenir l'une de ces ombres, shereen. Peut-être même la vôtre ? Pas un pion parmi tant d'autres au service de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g}, mais une baronne de l'ombre à part entière dans les Étendues. C'est un pouvoir bien plus impérieux et plus formidable que celui d'une simple intendante âpre au gain. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bu yolculuğa çıkmama neden olan şey de ne inancım ne de altınlarla mücevherlerin pırıltısıydı. Senin gibi ışık kaynaklarının kör edici parıltısı altına sığınanların ne büyük güçlere kavuşabileceğini gördüm şirinim. Antika kanunların etrafından dolaşarak düzenin ve ışığın hüküm sürmesini sağlayan gölgelerden olmanın verdiği güç. O gölge olacağım şirinim. Hatta belki de senin gölgen olurum... {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu'nun{/g} piyonu değil de Enginlik'te kendi iradesince hareket eden bir Gölge Baronu... Sinekten yağ çıkaran bir idareciden ziyade daha otoriter, daha dişli bir güç olacağım."
languages.original_text: "And it was not faith or the glitter of golden baubles that steered me on that voyage, oh no. I realised the power of those who hide in the blinding light of luminaries such as yourself, shereen. The power that lies in being a shadow that upholds order and light by skirting around antiquated laws. I will become that shadow, shereen. Perhaps I will even be your shadow? Not another pawn of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, but a Shadow Baron of the Expanse in my own right. A power far more imperious and formidable than any penny-pinching steward."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yolculuğa çıkmama neden olan şey de ne inancımdı, ne de altınların ve mücevherlerin pırıltısıydı, hayır. Senin gibi bir ışık kaynağının kör edici ışığında gizlenenlerin ne kadar büyük bir güce sahip olabileceklerini gördüm şirinim. Antika kanunların etrafından dolaşarak düzenin ve ışığın hüküm sürmesini sağlayan bir gölge olmanın verdiği güç. Ben o gölge olacağım şirinim. Hatta belki de senin gölgen olurum? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu{/g}'nun bir piyonu değil, Enginlik'te kendi iradesince hareket eden bir Gölge Baronu. Sinekten yağ çıkaran bir idareciden çok daha otoriter ve çok daha dişli bir güç."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
